author: Dragon_fire
title: surprisingly realistic
review: this is the best of the four bike sets, I think. it's pull back motor provides a lot of speed, it has excellent suspention and really cool fat tyres. it is basically a really great bike and i really recommend this

author: superbrick
title: really bad set
review:
Out of all the drome motorcycle sets, this is probably the worst one. The bike always falls after you pull the motor back. The motor is slower than all the others. One pro is the parts are really nice.

Overall I think it is a really terrible set.

If you are thinking of buying all four motorcycle sets, skip this one.

author: Legofan1300
title: Cool set but expensive
review:
This set is fantastic. My parents bought it to me when i was 5, but i didn't pay too much atention to it. now I'm 13 and I see its value. for little kids it's maybe a bit challenging.

It's a bit expensive for what it is but it's worth it if you are a pullback lego vehicle fan.
